Author: mud_octopus
Text: Bread also has a really surprising amount of sodium!

Author: throwawayedfeelz
Text: I think someone told me it's like 2-3g of water for every stored gram of carbs? So like... I always assumed that meant say if I ate 150g of carbs that's be almost half a kg, not to mention the actual food weight? I don't know the exact science, but I do know for sure that if I eat more carbs than usual even eating at a deficit the fluctuations hit me so much harder
